about_the_game:
The original soundtrack for Okhlos from A Shell in the Pit aka the best soundtrack in Ancient Greece! All tracks are presented as 254kbps+ MP3 and FLAC files.

Track List

A Shell in the Pit - Okhlos - Original Soundtrack - 01 Apollo
A Shell in the Pit - Okhlos - Original Soundtrack - 02 Lemnos
A Shell in the Pit - Okhlos - Original Soundtrack - 03 Atlantis
A Shell in the Pit - Okhlos - Original Soundtrack - 04 Sparta
A Shell in the Pit - Okhlos - Original Soundtrack - 05 Artemis
A Shell in the Pit - Okhlos - Original Soundtrack - 06 Delphi
A Shell in the Pit - Okhlos - Original Soundtrack - 07 Ares
A Shell in the Pit - Okhlos - Original Soundtrack - 08 Ephesos
A Shell in the Pit - Okhlos - Original Soundtrack - 09 Hades
A Shell in the Pit - Okhlos - Original Soundtrack - 10 Athens
A Shell in the Pit - Okhlos - Original Soundtrack - 11 Poseidon
A Shell in the Pit - Okhlos - Original Soundtrack - 12 Olympus
